Table of Contents

Name

qdqueue_empty - test whether a distributed queue is empty

Synopsis

#include <qthread/qdqueue.h>

int
qdqueue_empty (qdqueue_t *q);

Description

This function checks whether the given qdqueue is empty.

Return Value

The return value will be 1 if the queue is empty, or 0 otherwise.

See Also

qlfqueue_empty(3) , qdqueue_create(3) , qdqueue_enqueue(3) , qdqueue_dequeue(3) , qdqueue_destroy(3)
